The visual cue that underscores the speaker's preference for backlighting is option A: On-screen text reading “LOVE THAT SILHOUETTE!” with an arrow pointing to the guitarist’s backlit outline. This indicates that the speaker likes the dramatic effect of the guitarist being outlined against the dark background, which can be achieved through proper lighting setup.
